"Green" Invitations: Instead of traditional paper invitations, opt for eco-friendly invitations made of recycled paper or digital invitations sent via email.
Sustainable Flowers: Choose locally grown flowers or opt for flower alternatives such as succulents or herbs. This will reduce the carbon footprint associated with transporting flowers.
Reusable Favors: Instead of traditional favors, provide guests with reusable items such as tote bags or seed packets.
Energy-Efficient Lighting: Use energy-efficient LED lighting or candles for illumination during the wedding ceremony and reception.

Sustainable Food and Drink: Serve organic and locally sourced food and drinks to reduce the carbon footprint associated with transportation and packaging. Additionally, consider offering a buffet-style meal to reduce food waste.
